```{r setup, include=FALSE}
require(rgdal)
require(leaflet)
require(leaflet.extras)
require(leaflet.providers)
require(readit)

require(dplyr)
require(readxl)
require(stringr)
```

# Loading in the data

```{r}
#neighborhood tabulation areas
n_tabs <- readOGR("Neighborhood Tabulation Areas.geojson")

# MTA subway stations
stations <- readOGR("Subway Stations.geojson")


# MTA subway lines
lines <- readOGR("Subway Lines.geojson")

# Population counts for each neighborhood tabulation area
pop <- readit('demo_2016acs5yr_nta.xlsx')
```

```{r, controls}

base <-leaflet() %>%
  setView(lat = 40.75, lng = -74, zoom = 11.3) 

base %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$Stamen.TonerBackground)


```


```{r, polygon}


leaflet(data = n_tabs) %>%
  setView(lat = 40.75, lng = -73.9, zoom = 11.3) %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$Stamen.TonerBackground) %>%
  addPolygons(color = '#2ca25f', weight = 2)


```


# Point Maps with the NYC Subway
```{r}


leaflet(data = stations) %>%
  setView(lat = 40.75, lng = -74, zoom = 11.3) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$Stamen.TonerBackground) %>%
  addCircleMarkers(radius = 1, color = '#fc8d59', opacity = 1)


```

```{r}

leaflet(data = lines) %>%
  setView(lat = 40.75, lng = -73.9, zoom = 11.3) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$Stamen.TonerBackground) %>%
  addPolylines()


```
